arbitration.confirmText1: Are you sure you want to report a problem?
arbitration.confirmText2:
This will start the conflict resolution process,
            someone from Origin will be notified and all chat history will be made
            public to a moderator.
arbitration.request: In order to report a problem, you must enable Origin messaging. We also recommend that you start by reaching out to the {counterparty} and attempting to resolve the issue directly.
arbitration.rejectionText2: click below to go back to your listings.
footer.mission: Origin is building the sharing economy of tomorrow. Buyers and sellers will be able to transact without rent-seeking middlemen. We believe in lowering transaction fees, promoting free and transparent commerce, and giving early participants in the community a stake in the network.
photo-picker.macHelpText: Hold down "command" (⌘) to select multiple images
photo-picker.iosHelpText: Select multiple images to upload them all at once
photo-picker.windowsHelpText: Hold down "Ctrl" to select multiple images
photo-picker.androidHelpText: Select multiple images to upload them all at once
photo-picker.linuxHelpText: Hold down "Ctrl" to select multiple images
photo-picker.confirmRemoveImage: Are you sure you want to de-select this photo?
photo-picker.listingSize: Images may not exceed {maxImageMB}MB each. Maximum {maxImageCount} images.
photo-picker.maxImgCountMsg: No more than {maxImageCount} images may be uploaded. The extra images have been removed.
photo-picker.oversizeImages: Your selected image, {imageName}, is too large. Max allowed size is {maxImageMB}MB
price-field.price-help: The cost to buy this listing. Price is always in {currency}.
listing-create.navigationWarning: Are you sure you want to leave? If you leave this page your progress will be lost.
listing-create.whatTypeOfListing: What type of listing do you want to create?
listing-create.noSchemaSelectedError: You must first select a listing type
listing-create.form-help: Be sure to give your listing an appropriate title and description to let others know what you're offering. Adding some photos of your listing will help potential buyers decide if the want to buy your listing.
listing-create.whatHappensNextContent1: When you submit this listing, you will be asked to confirm your transaction in MetaMask. Buyers will then be able to see your listing and make offers on it.
listing-create.whatHappensNextContent2: Please review your listing before submitting. Your listing will appear to others just as it looks on the window to the left.
listing-create.successDisclaimer: Your listing will be visible within a few seconds. Here's what happens next:
listing-create.error1: There was a problem creating this listing.
listing-create.error2: See the console for more details.
listing-detail.loadingError: There was an error loading this listing.
listing-detail.successDisclaimer: You have made an offer on this listing. Your offer will be visible within a few seconds. Your {ETH} payment has been transferred to an escrow contract. Here's what happens next:
listing-detail.errorPurchasingListing: There was a problem purchasing this listing.
listing-detail.seeConsoleForDetails: See the console for more details.
listing-detail.suggestion: Try visiting the listings page and searching for something similar.
listings-grid.originContractNotFound: No Origin listing contracts were found on this network.
listings-grid.changeNetworks: You may need to change networks, or deploy the contract.
MessageNew.cannotReceiveMessages: This user has not yet enabled Origin Messaging.
MessageNew.cannotSendMessages: You need to enable Origin Messaging.
MessageNew.encryptionNotice: Your message will be encrypted. It will only be visible to you, the recipient, and an arbitrator in the event that a dispute arises.
messaging-provider.congrats: Congratulations! You can now message other users across the Origin Platform ecosystem! Why not start by taking a look around and telling us what you think about our DApp?
messaging-provider.welcome:
Welcome to the Origin Protocol Demo DApp! Our innovative messaging platform allows you to communicate with other Origin users in a secure and decentralized way. All of your messages will be encrypted and stored on IPFS. Messages can only be read by you, the recipient, and potentially a third-party arbitrator if either of you initiates a dispute and grants access to a cryptographically-generated, shared, private key.

In order to enable messaging you will need to use your Ethereum wallet to sign two statements. This will not cost any ETH, Origin Token, or gas.
arbitrationModals.confirmText1: Are you sure you want to report a problem?
arbitrationModals.confirmText0: Would you like to report a problem?
arbitrationModals.confirmText2:
This will start the conflict resolution process,
            someone from Origin will be notified and all chat history will be made
            public to a moderator.
arbitrationModals.request: In order to report a problem, you must enable Origin messaging. We also recommend that you start by reaching out to the {counterparty} and attempting to resolve the issue directly.
arbitrationModals.rejectionText2: click below to go back to your listings.
beta-modal.message1: Thanks for checking out Origin's Mainnet Beta.
beta-modal.message2: We're still actively developing the product. Please bear with us as we add new features and fix bugs.
beta-modal.message3: All transactions will use real Ether. Please take all offers to buy and sell seriously.
beta-modal.message4: Use caution when transacting with unknown buyers and sellers. Don't forget to verify your own identity.
beta-modal.message5: Any disputes will be resolved by Origin's arbitration team. No insurance is offered on any listings.
my-listing-card.confirmCloseListing: Are you sure that you want to permanently close this listing? This cannot be undone.
my-listings.no-listings: You don't have any listings yet.
my-listings.no-listings-steps: Follow the steps below to create your first listing!
my-listings.step-one: Choose the right category for your listing.
my-listings.step-two: Give your listing a name, description, and price.
my-listings.step-three: Preview your listing and publish it to the blockchain.
my-purchases.view-listings: Click below to view all listings.
my-sale-card.awaitConfirmation: Wait for the buyer to confirm the sale
my-sales.no-sales: You don't have any sales yet.
my-sales.no-sales-text: Click below to view your listings.
not-found.heading: How did I get here?
not-found.content: The page you’re looking for is no longer here, maybe it was never here in the first place. In any case, we sincerely apologize if it’s us and we forgive you if it’s you :)
getting-started.title: Get started selling on Origin!
getting-started.content: Learn how to sell on our DApp today.
onboarding-steps.stepOneDescription: Get started selling on the Origin DApp.
onboarding-steps.stepOneContentPartOneWi: You will use your Ethereum wallet to create listings and accept payment.
You will need an Ethereum wallet to create listings and accept payment.
onboarding-steps.stepOneContentPartTwo: Transactions on the Origin DApp are always made using {ethMark}.
onboarding-steps.stepTwoDescription: Increase trust and gain reputation with buyers.
onboarding-steps.stepTwoContent: Verifying your profile allows other users to know that you are a real person and increases the chances of successful transactions on Origin.
onboarding-steps.stepThreeDescription: Improve the chances of selling your good or service.
onboarding-steps.stepThreeHeading: Boost your listings with Origin Tokens
onboarding-steps.stepThreeContentPartOne: Origin Tokens (Symbol: {ognMark}) are used on the Origin DApp to boost your listings.
onboarding-steps.stepThreeContentPartTwo: Boosting will give your listing more visibility and increase the likelihood of successfully selling.
purchase-detail.awaitApproval: Wait for the seller to approve or reject your offer
purchase-detail.awaitApprovalInstruction: Your payment is currently in escrow. There is nothing for you to do at this time. Check back later.
purchase-detail.acceptOrRejectOffer: Accept or reject the buyer's offer
purchase-detail.acceptOfferInstruction: Click below to cancel or continue this transaction.
purchase-detail.waitForContact: Wait to be contacted by an Origin team member
purchase-detail.completePurchase: Complete sale and leave a review.
purchase-detail.submitThisForm: Release funds and review the seller once you confirm that the sale is complete. Your escrowed payment will be sent to the seller. If you're unhappy, please report a problem instead.
purchase-detail.buyerReviewPlaceholder: Your review should let others know about your experience transacting with this seller.
purchase-detail.waitForBuyer: Wait for the buyer to finalize the transaction
purchase-detail.fulfillObligation: Make sure you fulfill the order.
purchase-detail.awaitSellerReview: Wait for the seller to leave a review
purchase-detail.completeByReviewing: Leave a review of the buyer
purchase-detail.clickToReview: Leaving a review lets other sellers know about your experience with this buyer.
purchase-detail.sellerReviewPlaceholder: Your review should inform others about your experience transacting with this buyer.
purchase-detail.nothingToDo: Nothing for you to do at this time. Check back later.
user-card.heading: About the {title}
_wallet-card.yourBalance: You have 0 OGN
_wallet-card.balanceText: Having OGN is not required but will allow you         to create a listing that will be more visible to buyers.
warning.message: You're currently using the Origin Mainnet Beta.
warning.invitation: Found a bug? Open an issue on {github} or report it in our #bug-reports channel on {discord}.
web3-provider.intentRequiresMetaMask: In order to {web3Intent}, you must install MetaMask.
web3-provider.intentRequiresEthereumEnab: In order to {web3Intent}, you must use an Ethereum wallet-enabled browser.
web3-provider.intentRequiresSignIn: In order to {web3Intent}, you must sign in to {currentProvider}.
web3-provider.pleaseInstallMetaMask: Please install the MetaMask extension to access this site.
web3-provider.useWalletEnabledBrowser: Please access this site through a wallet-enabled browser:
_Guidance.content: {verifyingYourProfile} allows other users to know that you are a real person and increases the chances of successful transactions on Origin.
_Services.pleaseConnectAccounts: Please connect your accounts below to strengthen your identity on Origin.
AttestationSuccess.publishChangesReminde: Don't forget to publish your changes.
AttestationSuccess.publishChangesNotice: Publishing to the blockchain lets other users know that you have a verified profile.
ConfirmPublish.afterYouPublishNotice: After you publish your changes to the blockchain, other users will be able to see that you have verified the following:
ConfirmUpload.ifYouExitNotice: If you exit without publishing you’ll lose all your changes.
ConfirmUpload.readyToGoPublic: Ready to go public? After you publish your changes to the blockchain, other users will be able to see that you have verified the following:
EditProfile.descriptionPlaceholder: Tell us a little something about yourself
EditProfile.publicDataNotice: This information will be published on the blockchain and will be visible to everyone.
Profile.unsavedChangesWarn: If you exit without publishing, you'll lose all your changes.
Profile.noDescriptionUser: An Origin user without a description
Profile.seeConsole: See the console for more details
Profile.transactionBeingProcessed: Profile changes can be seen once the transaction is processed.
Profile.transactionProgressDropdown: See transaction progress from the dropdown in navigation bar.
VerifyAirbnb.airbnbProfilePublished: Other users will know that you have a verified Airbnb profile.
VerifyAirbnb.enterCodeIntoAirbnb: Go to Airbnb website, edit your profile and paste the following text into profile description.
VerifyAirbnb.continueToConfirmationCodeC: Continue once the confirmation code is entered in your Airbnb profile.
VerifyEmail.emailNotPublished: Other users will know that you have a verified email address. Your actual email address will not be published on the blockchain.
VerifyEmail.enterCode: Enter the code we sent you below
VerifyFacebook.accountNotPublic: Other users will know that you have a verified Facebook account, but your account details will not be published on the blockchain. We will never post on your behalf.
VerifyPhone.enterPhoneNumberSms: Enter your phone number below and {originId} will send you a verification code via SMS.
VerifyPhone.enterPhoneNumberCall: Enter your phone number below and {originId} will call you with a verification code.
VerifyPhone.phoneNumberNotPublished: Other users will know that you have a verified phone number. Your actual phone number will not be published on the blockchain.
VerifyPhone.enterCodeBelow: Enter the code we sent you below
VerifyTwitter.twitterNotPublic: Other users will know that you have a verified Twitter account. Your username will not be published on the blockchain. We will never tweet on your behalf.
